mapper.select: select * from team_member where team_no = #{value} ORDER BY saving DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE team_member a SET a.final_rank = (SELECT b.ranking FROM(SELECT team_member.*, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY saving DESC) AS ranking FROM team_member WHERE team_no= #{value} )b WHERE a.team_no = b.team_no AND a.id=b.id)
